Title: Hot Sauce Families
Book Description: 'Capsicum-based hot sauces are not just about heat- but most people don't think about the other ingredients in their favorite brands.  Not all hot sauces are alike; they fall into distinct groups depending upon their major ingredients (other than hot peppers- vinegar- and water).  Join Eric and Cathy Raymond for a hot sauce tasting experience designed to teach you how to compare your favorites to new ones.  '

Title: Masquerade
Presenters: Suzette Mariotti, Cathy Raymond, Catherine Shaffer, Annikki Raiford
Book Description: 'Anyone who'd like to join in our Masquerade contest is encouraged to join us for the Muster- so we can announce you in the fashion you are accustomed!'
